product_name: Kurgo Quick Release Tru-Fit Smart Harness - X-Small - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Keep your pup safe and secure in the car and on walks. This X-Small, 5-way adjustable harness secures to a seat belt, alleviating the distractions a dog can cause in a vehicle.
short_description: Keep your pup safe and secure in the car and on walks. This X-Small, 5-way adjustable harness secures to a seat belt, alleviating the distractions a dog can cause in a vehicle.
